basics.name: Imed Kouki
basics.label: Master’s student in Data Science and Junior RPA Developer
basics.summary: Master’s student in Data Science with keen interest in machine learning and automation. Currently working as a Junior RPA Developer, looking to work on projects involving ML or automation, with a focus on both practical applications and research.

work.name: TUI Group
work.summary: Spearheaded automation enhancements that streamlined processes handling 15,000 bookings/year, achieving an estimated FTE saving of 5.7 and cost reduction annually using MS Power Automate.
highlights: Reduced error rates and achieved a handling time reduction from 40 minutes per case to an average of 6 minutes per booking.
Collaborated closely with responsible analysts and business collaborators to ensure seamless integration and functionality.

work.name: ADACTIM — WEEVIO Group
work.summary: Collaborated with business analysts to identify automation opportunities and convert requirements into technical specifications.
highlights: Configured and deployed a GLPI container using Docker/Docker Compose on Windows (Ubuntu on WSL2).
Developed and tested UiPath-based automation solutions to streamline supervision processes.

work.name: DRÄXLMAIER — Group SATS
work.summary: Acquired practical experience in switch configuration and gained proficiency in utilizing Packet Tracer for network simulations.

education.institution: National School of Computer Science (ENSI) - University of Manouba
Higher Institute Of Technological Studies (Rades/Siliana Branch)

projects.name: Image Classification with CNN using PyTorch
projects.description: Developed a convolutional neural network (CNN) model for image classification using PyTorch, focusing on optimizing accuracy through hyperparameter tuning and data augmentation.
